colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES SOGS BSNGO BA DANG SMON LAM GYI BKRA SHIS KYIS MTHA' BRGYAN PAR BYA'O, ,CES BLA MGON DBYER MED KYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MDOR BSDUS 'DI NI DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA HAL KHA MI 'GYUR KUNG GIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, CHOS SMRA BA LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, CHOS TSUL DU MA LA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
